trans-unit.source: Represents a converter for dynamic update map items.
trans-unit.target: 동적 업데이트 맵 항목에 대 한 변환기를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.XamlIntegration.DynamicUpdateMapItemConverter"></xref> class.
Determines whether the specified type can be converted from.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 형식에서 변환할 수 있는지 여부를 결정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Context information that is used for conversion.
The type to convert from.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the specified type can be converted from; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>지정된 된 형식;에서 변환할 수 있는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified type can be converted to.
trans-unit.target: 시스템에 지정된 된 형식으로 변환할 수 있는지 확인 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Context information that is used for conversion.
The type to convert to.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the specified type can be converted to; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>지정된 된 형식; 변환할 수 있는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified value to a new representation specified by the derived class.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 값을 파생된 클래스에서 지정한 새 표현으로 변환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Context information that is used for conversion.
An optional culture information.
The object to convert.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the specified value to a new representation is converted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>지정된 된 값을 새 표현; 변환 하는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified value to the specified representation.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 값을 지정한 표현으로 변환합니다.

trans-unit.source: Context information that is used for conversion.
An optional culture information.
The object to convert.
The type to convert to.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the specified value to the specified representation is converted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>지정된 된 값을 지정한 표현; 변환 하는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.
